Technology.Name: Subspatial Dynamics
Technology.LongDescription: We have discovered that the efficiency of traveling through subspace is affected by the shape of a ship's subspace bubble. This technology allows for the construction of subspace "plows", which manipulate that shape to increase a ship's speed at warp.

UnlockedBonus.Name: FTL Efficiency
UnlockedBonus.Description: The power penalty incurred by ships at warp is reduced by 20%

UnlockedBonus.Name: Slipstreams
UnlockedBonus.Description: Ships traveling within your own empire's borders gain 40% bonus to their FTL speeds.
